item.title: These states could redistrict before the 2026 midterms
item.description: As Trump pushes for a more Republican-friendly House map, more than half a dozen states are potential targets for mid-decade tweaks to congressional b...

item.title: Bolton continues criticism of Trump foreign policy following FBI raids
item.description: In a new op-ed, Bolton argued Trump’s Ukraine policy is “no more coherent today than it was last Friday” when the raids happened.

item.title: Judge orders new map that could give Democrats another House seat — in Utah
item.description: A judge ruled that Republican lawmakers in Utah illegally drew a congressional map that gave their party all of the state’s congressional seats.
